name: Magic Circle (PhatBread)
description:
An endless randomized maze sends enemies to ruin your day

Reach the goal (Blue Rotating Star) to progress to the next level

You are the Green Circle

The Purple Black Hole cannot be entered, and will slowly wander across the maze

The Wooden Fairy will also wander, much faster, but can be killed by entering their space before they enter yours

The Green Blob is slow than the fairy but will specifically chase after you - they can also be killed by entering their space

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys= Move Up, Left, Down, or Right respectively

Escape: Pause Game

R: Restart from stage 1

T: Turbo - Cycle between 3 faster and 1 slower game speed

Enter: Activate auto bot to play the game for you (for experimental purposes)

High Score of Bot: 35
